Body: Is there a branch of linguistics using Calculus as a mathematical tool? I mean, can we use differential or integrate in linguistic study?
Title: Is there a branch of linguistics using Calculus as a mathematical tool?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: Research interests: syntax, linguistic morphology, typology, historical linguistics, lexicography, lexicology, psycholinguistics, language acquisition, British accents

OwnerUser.AboutMe: My little girl,your cold hands are in mine now.
